title: Ep. 591 - The Silenced Majority
description:
President Trump appeals to the “silent majority,” Democrats want Biden to bail on the debates, and the MN police release body cam footage of George Floyd.

Get your copy of "How to Destroy America in Three Easy Steps" here: https://utm.io/uHjW
